Description: Weight: ⅓ dīnār. Eight line Kufic inscription. Made of olive-green glass.
Curator's comments: The script of the last two lines is visible but minute and seemingly confused; the restoration of the executive's name depends to some extend on the fact that what can be seen does not fit with the names of the other three executives known to have been in office under al-Qāsim. A half-dīnār weight of al-Qāsim and Yazīd has been published (Fahmī 1957, 47). Bibliography: Fahmi, A. 1957. ‘Sinaj al-sikka fī fajr al-Islām’. Cairo.
Bibliographic references: Morton 1985 / A Catalogue of Early Islamic Glass Stamps (67)
Associated names: Named in inscription: Yazīd b. Abī Yazīd
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Augustus Wollaston Franks
